text: Sharsheret (Hebrew for â€œchain") is a national not-for-profit organization. It was created to support young Jewish women with breast cancer, or their families. It was founded by Rochelle Shoretz in 2001. Their headquarter is in Teaneck, New Jersey. ==Other websites== *Sharsheret Homepage Category:Non- profit organizations of the United States Category:2001 establishments in the United States Category:Organizations based in New Jersey
